item.title: Build emails with attachments using SMTP, MIME standard (AWS SES Case)
item.description: To send an email with AWS SES service, there are two options: Connecting directly to the AWS SMTP server with SMTP protocols. Or call AWS API over HTTPS. The SMTP is easier, but then you have to open SMTP ports (587 or 25 usually). Using AWS SES API:AWS SES API has two options to send emails as described in the documentation: Send simple text only formatted email. Send email with attachments as raw formatted email.
